EmailTemplate.name: CSM Quote Request Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Thank You For Contacting Cummins Sales and Service Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Cummins Sales and Service. We have received your request and your quote has been attached to this email. When ready to purchase please send back completed form and approved quote to cssna.etools@cummins.com for processing.
Thank you and have a great day!
*If you are Tax Exempt, please send an updated Tax Exemption Form to include your Cummins Account # to - CSSNATaxExempt@cummins.com so the Tax records can be updated for your account.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
